CSR: Thank you for calling Valiant Bank Customer Service. How can I assist you today? Alex: Hi, I'm having trouble logging into the My Money Centre app. It keeps saying my credentials are invalid. CSR: I see. Can I have your name and account details to assist you further? Alex: My name is Alex Johnson, and I recently received my credit card. CSR: Thank you, Alex. It seems your account might be temporarily locked due to multiple unsuccessful login attempts. Did you receive a temporary password via email that you needed to concatenate with your birthday? Alex: Oh, I didn't notice that instruction. I just tried using the password provided. CSR: That's okay. Let's proceed with resetting your access. I'll guide you through it. Alex: Okay, thank you. CSR: First, please reset your password using the temporary one sent to your email. After that, concatenate it with your birthday as instructed. Alex: Done. Now I'm entering the concatenated password. CSR: Perfect. You should be able to log in now. Alex: It worked! I'm in. Thank you so much for your help. CSR: You're welcome, Alex. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? Alex: No, that should be all. Thanks again! CSR: You're welcome. Have a great day, Alex! Alex: You too. Goodbye! CSR: Goodbye.
